issue.title: Node 18 will not install on CentOS7 as Glibc version is unsupported
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18196](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18196). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Use Node 16 LTS if the GLIBC version does not support Node 18 LTS  - https://centosfaq.org/centos/nodejs-18-on-centos-7/
